Owner Undead:

Do u want it to be a command?

No, I got plenty of those and they’re easy… I can just make one up right now…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = 1234; teleportToY = 5678; sendMessage("Welcome back home!"); }

item.title: Making teleports?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

How do I make teleports?
I don’t have a clickingMost.java file, do I need to make one? O.O
It’s all in the client.java I think. The quest thing is in there, the emotes thing is in there…
I put in this code and i thought it would work… and it doesnt idk why

case 4140: teleportToX = 2853; teleportToY = 3591; sendMessage("You teleport home. Welcome back."); break;
I don’t get any errors, either.

Read full topic
